input.sentences: the friends gathered in one apartment to celebrate the passover holiday together .
it was a thirsty group | so one friend topped of another 's wine .
everybody was enjoying the celebration | and smiles were abundant .
one of the friends was just a little too camera shy after getting tipsy .
the spirit of the holiday was not forgotten | and all of the symbols of seder plate were represented .
output.sentences: We are all together for a fun night
Some of my friends came with the drinks
We all sat together and talked about life
We even had a few silly jokes from our camera shy friends.
We completed the evening with a wonderful Seder meal
